name: The Lost Galleon
description:
An adventure game created for Global Game Jam 2021 Online
Theme : Lost & Found

50 years ago, the biggest galleon set sail. That was the last time human eye saw the ship and the crew was nowhere to be found. Can you find The Lost Galleon and restore my family's honor? Hop on board, pirate, for a legendary adventure.

Controls:

Left click - interact with current scene or select inventory item
SPACE - Close message boxes
Right Click - de-select current inventory item
Mouse Wheel - scroll inventory items if needed (must have at the same time from than 6 items)

Credits:

Vasilis Chonianakis - Code
Spyridon Glarakis - Graphics, Music, Sounds
